sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含有"有益的，有利的"之意。
means: beneficial ： 侧重对健康、身心或事业有益。
advantageous ： 多指能直接导致相对优势或有助于达到目的的事。
profitable ： 多用于指能获得实用的或可获利的事。

sentence.Network_en: Drug manufacturing is the most profitable business in America.
sentence.Network_cn: 制药业是美国利润最丰厚的业务。

sentence.Network_en: Tina believed that, given time, her business would become profitable.
sentence.Network_cn: 蒂娜相信假以时日，她的生意一定会盈利。

sentence.Network_en: The bottom line is that it's not profitable.
sentence.Network_cn: 最重要的一点是它无利可图。

means.word_mean: 有利益的,有用的,有帮助的

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, from the verb profiter (see profit)

entry.tran: 盈利的；有利润的；赚钱的
entry.def: A profitable organization or practice makes a profit.

example.ex: Drug manufacturing is the most profitable business in America...
example.tran: 制药业是美国利润最丰厚的业务。

example.ex: It was profitable for them to produce large amounts of food.
example.tran: 生产大量的食物能让他们获利。

entry.tran: 有利可图的；有益的；有用的
entry.def: Something that is profitable results in some benefit for you.

example.ex: ...collaboration which leads to a profitable exchange of personnel and ideas.
example.tran: 有利于人员和观念交流的合作

auth_sentence.content: This is - a profitable business, not charity!
auth_sentence.res_content: This is - a profitable business, not charity!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is - a profitable business, not charity!

auth_sentence.content: Corn and wheat can be less profitable than opium.
auth_sentence.res_content: Corn and wheat can be less profitable than opium.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Corn and wheat can be less profitable than opium.

auth_sentence.content: But they will be less profitable in good times.
auth_sentence.res_content: But they will be less profitable in good times.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But they will be less profitable in good times.

stems_affixes.word_buile: fashion[n.流行式样[或货品],风尚,风气;样子,方式]+able……的→adj.流行的,时髦的
profit[n.利润,收益]+able可以……的→adj.有利可图的,有益的

Sentence.sentence: It proves profitable to both sides.
To give space for more profitable products.
He turned a failing company into a profitable business.
The problem, Schweitzer says, is the actual trades were not profitable.

means.word_mean: 有利可图的,赢利的 ; 有益的,有好处的

sentences.en: That business became profitable last year.
sentences.cn: 那项生意去年变得很赚钱。

jushi.english: That business became profitable last year.
jushi.chinese: 那项生意去年变得很赚钱。
